Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

A half century ago this year, a group of forward-thinking lawyers and activists came together to form the ACLU of Arkansas to defend civil rights and civil liberties in our state.

Fifty years later, we're still fighting — and it's all thanks to your steadfast and unwavering support.

Join us this Thursday, September 12 in Little Rock for a special anniversary kickoff reception, exclusively for supporters and members.
